application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - b) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5 / 1:1) drawings of new architraves, skirtings and cornices; c) Details of any new hard flooring including location, form, a sample and a section (1:10) showing retention of any historic floor boards/flooring. Any historic floor boards should be retained and any new hard flooring should abut retained skirtings, architraves and hearths; d) Details of servicing for the proposed bathrooms and kitchen, including ventilation systems; e) Details of servicing for the proposed ac units and dehumidifiers; f) Elevation (1:50) and section (1:20) drawings of new built-in joinery in tv room, bathrooms and bedrooms; g) Details of the replacement staircase at 1:20, including sample of materials) of Listed Building consent LB/24/02358 (Internal alterations including repositioning of kitchen)
